actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, Treasury Department.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a taxpayer to expense the costs of plant and equipment destroyed in whole or in part in a nature disaster.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a taxpayer to expense (deduct rather than charge to the capital account) the replacement costs of plant or equipment destroyed in whole or in part in a natural disaster.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a taxpayer to expense the costs of plant and equipment destroyed in whole or in part in a nature disaster.
